turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I really need a cup of joe to get my afternoon lull out of the way. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was going to get something from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you know if the Starbucks blonde caffe latte is available right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it of whole milk with extra foam, too.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. No. Trying to cut out the sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a venti cafe blonde with whole milk and extra foam, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's the blonde cafe latte, right? With a Yeah, extra foam. Yeah, make sure extra foam.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to I want to get it from the the Starbucks on Peachtree. It's on Peachtree Street in Atlanta.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the Starbucks on peach street.
